page.title: 13PEOPLE (FROYLE/HOLYBOURNE)
page.content:
At Domesday Froyle had about 200 people; 23 smallholders and 10 slaves, all with families. Froyle now has 871 people, (over 100 at Treloar College), and its school of 24 pupils is about to close.
At Domesday Holybourne had only about 50 people; 6 villagers, 4 smallholders and 1 slave, Neatham nearby being much larger with 54 villagers, 26 smallholders and 16 slaves. Much recent new building in Holybourne has caused a population rise, Holybourne School now having over 100 pupils, but Neatham has declined to a small hamlet.
